fsrtool.name: fsrtool_ships_player
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_ships_player` ( `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `Moros` smallint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `Naglfar` smallint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `Revelation` smallint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `Phoenix` smallint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `hattdread` smallint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
